name: MomentousValue
description:
Hey guys! its been really long since i made a game and uploaded it here on itch.io. the reason for this is beacause most of you already know im working on a series a spiderman one to be more specific. i had also broken my arm but thats starting to heal

this game here is just a test since im trying out GDevelop to expand my games to pc and the game is a game where i just followed a tutorial to make it and it was surprisingly not hard. this game is very short and plus most of my player base are mobile players so most of you wont be able to play it

if your wondering when a proper game will come out dont worry! once the new max2d update comes out i may remaster project plasma as i wanted. the original video for that was privated. if i master GDevelop really quickly i will remaster and re-create some of my dead games. im looking at you similarity!

well uh i guess enjoy this game

(Xbox Controller supported)
